import * as C from './styles' import {Theme} from '../../components/Theme/intex' import {FormActions, useForm} from '../../context/FormContext' import React, {useEffect} from 'react' import {useHistory} from 'react-router-dom' import {EmailIcon, FacebookIcon, LinkedinIcon, RedditIcon, TwitterIcon, WhatsappIcon,} from "react-share"; export const FormStep4 = () => { const {state, dispatch} = useForm() const history = useHistory() useEffect(() => { if (state.name === '') { history.push('/') } else { dispatch({ type: FormActions.setCurrentStep, payload: 4 }) } }, []) return (

Step 3/3

You'll pay 2500 PKR total

or 475 PKR in Tax alone

or 2025 PKR (Tax not included)

Share results with friends:

 ) }
